mapper.select: select count(*)from message where messageState=1 and receiver=#{id}

select rnum, messageNo,sender,receiver,messageDate,messageContent,messageState, profileIMG FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by ms.messageNo desc) as rnum, ms.messageNo, ms.sender,ms.receiver,ms.messageDate,ms.messageContent,ms.messageState, m2.profileIMG FROM message ms, member m2 where ms.sender=m2.id and ms.receiver =#{messageVO.id}) rnum where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by messageNo desc

select rnum, messageNo,sender,receiver,messageDate,messageContent,messageState, profileIMG FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by ms.messageNo desc) as rnum, ms.messageNo, ms.sender,ms.receiver,ms.messageDate,ms.messageContent,ms.messageState, m2.profileIMG FROM message ms, member m2 where ms.receiver=m2.id and ms.sender =#{messageVO.id}) rnum where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by messageNo desc

select rnum, messageNo,sender,receiver,messageDate,messageContent,messageState, profileIMG FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by ms.messageNo desc) as rnum, ms.messageNo, ms.sender,ms.receiver,ms.messageDate,ms.messageContent,ms.messageState, m2.profileIMG FROM message ms, member m2 where ms.messageState=1 and ms.sender=m2.id and ms.receiver =#{messageVO.id}) rnum where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by messageNo desc
mapper.update: update message set messageState=0 where messageNo=#{value}
